item.title: Ubuntu Hacks: Launching Chrome Apps at Startup
item.description: Chrome apps are really handy when you don’t want to overhaul your system with apps for every little purpose. Starting those apps at startup can be used instead of manually starting them every time you want to use them. Like starting the messenger at startup of the system. To do that.
